nodes.id: 中国共产党三明市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党三明市委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在福建省三明市的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Sanming City, Fujian Province.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中共三明市委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, current Secretary of the CPC Sanming Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中共三明市委副书记、三明市市长。
description.en: Chinese politician, current Deputy Secretary of the CPC Sanming Municipal Committee and Mayor of Sanming.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中共三明市委副书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, current Deputy Secretary of the CPC Sanming Municipal Committee.

nodes.id: 中国共产党福建省委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党福建省委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在福建省的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Fujian Province.

description.zh-cn: 由毛泽东发动和领导的政治运动，期间中共三明地方委员会等地方机构陷入瘫痪。
description.en: A political movement initiated and led by Mao Zedong, during which local organizations like the CPC Sanming Prefectural Committee were paralyzed.

nodes.id: 中国共产党三明地方委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党三明地方委员会

description.zh-cn: 中共三明市委的前身之一，在文化大革命期间陷入瘫痪。
description.en: One of the predecessors of the CPC Sanming Municipal Committee, paralyzed during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命期间成立，取代了中共三明地委的领导职能。
description.en: Established during the Cultural Revolution, it replaced the leadership functions of the CPC Sanming Prefectural Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军曾存在的一个大军区。
description.en: A former military region of the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间福建省的权力机构。
description.en: The organ of power in Fujian Province during the Cultural Revolution.

nodes.id: 中国共产党三明地区委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党三明地区委员会

description.zh-cn: 中共三明市委的前身，由中国共产党三明地区第一次代表大会选举产生。
description.en: The predecessor of the CPC Sanming Municipal Committee, elected by the first CPC Sanming Regional Congress.

nodes.id: 中国共产党三明地区第一次代表大会

zh-cn: 中国共产党三明地区第一次代表大会

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院
en: State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府。
description.en: The Central People's Government of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 福建省曾存在的行政区划，后被省辖三明市取代。
description.en: A former administrative division in Fujian Province, later replaced by the prefecture-level city of Sanming.

description.zh-cn: 福建省下辖的地级市。
description.en: A prefecture-level city in Fujian Province.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共三明市委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Secretary of the CPC Sanming Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共三明市委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Secretary of the CPC Sanming Municipal Committee.

description.en: Chinese politician, former Secretary of the CPC Sanming Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共三明市委书记、副书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Secretary and Deputy Secretary of the CPC Sanming Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共三明市委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Secretary of the CPC Sanming Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共三明市委书记、副书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Secretary and Deputy Secretary of the CPC Sanming Municipal Committee.

description.en: Chinese politician, former Secretary and Deputy Secretary of the CPC Sanming Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共三明市委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Secretary of the CPC Sanming Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共三明市委书记、副书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Secretary and Deputy Secretary of the CPC Sanming Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共三明市委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Secretary of the CPC Sanming Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共三明市委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Secretary of the CPC Sanming Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共三明市委副书记，后因被调查而离职。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Deputy Secretary of the CPC Sanming Municipal Committee, who left office after being investigated.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共三明市委副书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Deputy Secretary of the CPC Sanming Municipal Committee.

relationships.source: 中国共产党三明市委员会
relationships.target: 中国共产党福建省委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党三明市委员会的业务上级机构是中国共产党福建省委员会。
description.en: The operational superior of the CPC Sanming Municipal Committee is the CPC Fujian Provincial Committee.

relationships.target: 中国共产党三明地方委员会

description.zh-cn: 1966年文化大革命开始后，造反派于1967年1月夺权，导致中国共产党三明地方委员会机构陷入瘫痪。
description.en: After the Cultural Revolution began in 1966, rebels seized power in January 1967, causing the paralysis of the CPC Sanming Prefectural Committee.

relationships.target: 三明专区革命委员会

description.zh-cn: 经中共福州军区党委批准，成立三明专区革命委员会。
description.en: The Sanming Prefectural Revolutionary Committee was established with the approval of the Party Committee of the Fuzhou Military Region.

relationships.target: 三明专区革命委员会

description.zh-cn: 经福建省革命委员会批准，成立三明专区革命委员会。
description.en: The Sanming Prefectural Revolutionary Committee was established with the approval of the Fujian Provincial Revolutionary Committee.

relationships.target: 中国共产党三明地方委员会

description.zh-cn: 三明专区革命委员会成立后，取代了中共三明地委的领导职能。
description.en: After its establishment, the Sanming Prefectural Revolutionary Committee replaced the leadership functions of the CPC Sanming Prefectural Committee.

relationships.source: 中国共产党三明地区第一次代表大会
relationships.target: 中国共产党三明地区委员会

description.zh-cn: 大会选举产生中国共产党三明地区首届委员会，标志着中共三明地委的重新建立。
description.en: The congress elected the first CPC Sanming Regional Committee, marking the re-establishment of the CPC Sanming Prefectural Committee.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国国务院
relationships.target: 三明地区

description.zh-cn: 国务院批准撤销三明地区。
description.en: The State Council approved the abolition of the Sanming Prefecture.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国国务院
relationships.target: 三明市

description.zh-cn: 国务院批准设立省辖三明市。
description.en: The State Council approved the establishment of the province-administered Sanming City.

relationships.source: 中国共产党福建省委员会
relationships.target: 中国共产党三明市委员会

description.zh-cn: 中共福建省委批准成立中国共产党三明市委员会。
description.en: The CPC Fujian Provincial Committee approved the establishment of the CPC Sanming Municipal Committee.

黄琪玉

description.zh-cn: 邓本元接替黄琪玉任三明市委书记。
description.en: Deng Benyuan succeeded Huang Qiyu as Secretary of the Sanming Municipal Party Committee.

relationships.target: 邓本元

description.zh-cn: 杜源生接替邓本元任三明市委书记。
description.en: Du Yuansheng succeeded Deng Benyuan as Secretary of the Sanming Municipal Party Committee.

relationships.target: 黄建平 (1961年)

description.zh-cn: 黄建平于2019年8月被查，其政治生涯受到影响。
description.en: Huang Jianping was investigated in August 2019, which affected his political career.
